p: In order to prepare the extracts, dried powdered of different samples of H. persicum were used. About 30 ml of the methanol was added to 2 g of samples and put in an ultrasonic bath (Frequency, 100 kHz; power intensity, 160 W; temperature, 35°C) for 30 min. Then, the extract was filtered, evaporated, and stored at –20°C until further analysis.
